item.title: Vulkan Progress 1
item.description: Progress Pics I have managed to get triangle rendering in Dear ImGui. Resources ImGui Vulkan + SDL example Sascha Willems Vulkan samples Vulkan Programming Guide API Without Secrets Khronos Notes I’m going pretty slow and looking up pretty much every function and struct. It takes a lot of code, and there are a lot of concepts to build up a mental model for. Pipelines, render passes, attachments, queues etc.
